name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-pnpjs-project-online
title: PnPjs Project Online
shortDescription: This sample shows how to use SPFx to consume data from the Project Online REST API using a custom module for PnPjs. The web part is currently logging the data returned from the API to the browser console as a simple proof of concept.
longDescription: This sample shows how to use SPFx to consume data from the Project Online REST API using a custom module for PnPjs. The web part is currently logging the data returned from the API to the browser console as a simple proof of concept.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
